channel.title: Lunar Magics
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/23stele.png[/img] [b]Information[/b] [i]Well, I've always been a fan of the Lunar animations and graphics, so since we can recreate it to our own expectations, I've decided to try and enable every, if not majority of the Lunar spellbook. I understand this will be a challenge since I've only decided to start a RSPS (RuneScape Private Server) recently, most of it has been trial and error but It's coming along nicely in my opinion.[/i]
[i]Note: I'll update this thread every time I make progress.[/i] [left] [b]Spellbook Swap[/b]
[ul][li]Animation[/li] [li]Graphics[/li] [li]Change spellbooks[/li] [li]Require runes for casting the spell[/li][/ul]
[b]Plank Make[/b]
[ul][li]Animation[/li] [li]Graphics[/li] [li]Delete logs from invent and replace with correct planks[/li] [li]Require runes for casting the spell[/li][/ul]
[b]Humidify[/b]
[ul][li]Animation[/li] [li]Graphics[/li] [li]Fill/replace invent with water filled items[/li] [li]Require runes for casting the spell[/li][/ul]
[/left]
[b]And of course, the media behind this;[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ex4irt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2mysr4k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/dh6be8.png[/img]
Things I'm looking for at the moment [code]All of the lunar animations All of the graphics required Figure out how to make it delete the runes once casted the spell Make the spells do what they are meant to do Find out how to make it start an animation, then start the second one along with the graphics then to end the animation[/code]
[i]P.S: I don't really care if you think this is a pointless project, It's something I've wanted to do for a while now. If you're a GrammarNAZI and notice a lot of spelling, punctuation faults, just tell me and I'll fix it up also, if you can help with anything I'm looking for, please send me a PM or something, it would be appreciated. [/i][/center]

item.title: Lunar Magics
item.dc:creator: @A_New_LIght A New LIght
item.description:
@A_New_LIght wrote:

[quote="[J"]ava link=topic=522689.msg3801660#msg3801660 date=1320081305]

The 459+ have the anims and gfxs. So it’s not that hard.

I’m starting with 317. I’m not working on anything higher. I’ve also checked the lists and can’t seem to find any with the animations/graphics I need also, if it’s not that hard, how come not many people have attempted it? It’s just a side project.[/quote]I would assume that is because most servers are combat oriented sadly.

Read full topic

item.title: Lunar Magics
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

[center]
Information
Well, I’ve always been a fan of the Lunar animations and graphics, so since we can recreate it to our own expectations, I’ve decided to try and enable every, if not majority of the Lunar spellbook. I understand this will be a challenge since I’ve only decided to start a RSPS (RuneScape Private Server) recently, most of it has been trial and error but It’s coming along nicely in my opinion.

Note: I’ll update this thread every time I make progress.
[left]
Spellbook Swap

[ul][li]Animation[/li]
[li]Graphics[/li]
[li]Change spellbooks[/li]
[li]Require runes for casting the spell[/li][/ul]

Plank Make

[ul][li]Animation[/li]
[li]Graphics[/li]
[li]Delete logs from invent and replace with correct planks[/li]
[li]Require runes for casting the spell[/li][/ul]

Humidify

[ul][li]Animation[/li]
[li]Graphics[/li]
[li]Fill/replace invent with water filled items[/li]
[li]Require runes for casting the spell[/li][/ul]

[/left]

And of course, the media behind this;


Things I’m looking for at the moment

All of the lunar animations All of the graphics required Figure out how to make it delete the runes once casted the spell Make the spells do what they are meant to do Find out how to make it start an animation, then start the second one along with the graphics then to end the animation

P.S: I don’t really care if you think this is a pointless project, It’s something I’ve wanted to do for a while now. If you’re a GrammarNAZI and notice a lot of spelling, punctuation faults, just tell me and I’ll fix it up also, if you can help with anything I’m looking for, please send me a PM or something, it would be appreciated. [/center]

Read full topic
